comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Police History, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 51097746@N04
comment._content: I ran across this and a few other photos while doing research on my Great Grandfather A C Jackson. It's the only information I have on this long lost relative. If anyone knows about this family I'd love to find out about them. Two of A C's children were photographers as well. jpike11@gmail.com

comment._content: Dear crazycatlady8, your local library can put you intouch with family history research centres and groups. The State Library of New Sooth Wales has a Family History research centre.
